name: Death & Taxes
description: Death & Taxes Provisions and Spirits is an acclaimed cocktail bar at 26 Cheney St in Reno's Midtown district, specializing in rare and sought-after whiskeys. Named one of America's Top Whisky Bars by Whisky Advocate, the bar features a dimly lit, intimate atmosphere with leather couches, a fireplace, and expert mixologists crafting cocktails organized by spirit type. The extensive menu ranges from gin-based creations to smoked whiskey cocktails, with an off-menu selection for adventurous drinkers. They also operate a boutique bottle shop where patrons can purchase rare whiskeys to take home. Sister bar to Amari and Curse of Cane.
shortDescription: Whisky Advocate-ranked cocktail bar with rare whiskeys and expert mixology in Midtown.

faqs.question: What kind of bar is Death & Taxes?
faqs.answer: It's a speakeasy-style cocktail bar with a hidden entrance, dimly lit interior, and focus on expertly crafted classic cocktails.

faqs.question: Do I need a reservation?
faqs.answer: Reservations aren't required but the bar is small and popular. Arriving early is recommended.

faqs.question: Can Death & Taxes accommodate a golf group?
faqs.answer: The intimate setting works best for smaller groups of 4-8. For larger groups, contact them in advance.

meta.title: Death & Taxes – Speakeasy Cocktails in Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Experience prohibition-era cocktails at Death & Taxes, Reno's acclaimed speakeasy. An unforgettable nightcap for golf groups.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Death & Taxes. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Rebecca C.

testimonials.quote: Death & Taxes has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right in the heart of Reno. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Angela N.
